name: Xero Assets API
description: The Assets API exposes fixed asset related functions of the Xero Accounting application and can be used for a variety of purposes such as creating assets, retrieving asset valuations etc.

status.description: Required when retrieving a collection of assets. See Asset Status Codes

page.description: Results are paged. This specifies which page of the results to return. The default page is 1.

pageSize.description: The number of records returned per page. By default the number of records returned is 10.

orderBy.description: Requests can be ordered by AssetType, AssetName, AssetNumber, PurchaseDate and PurchasePrice. If the asset status is DISPOSED it also allows DisposalDate and DisposalPrice.

filterBy.description: A string that can be used to filter the list to only return assets containing the text. Checks it against the AssetName, AssetNumber, Description and AssetTypeName fields.

timeout.description: Timeout specifies the number of milliseconds before the request times out. If the request takes longer than timeout, the request will be aborted.

assetId.description: The Xero-generated Id for the asset

assetTypeId.description: The Xero-generated Id for the asset type

purchaseDate.description: The date the asset was purchased YYYY-MM-DD

purchasePrice.description: The purchase price of the asset

disposalDate.description: The date the asset was disposed

disposalPrice.description: The price the asset was disposed at

warrantyExpiryDate.description: The date the asset’s warranty expires (if needed) YYYY-MM-DD

depreciationMethod.description: The method of depreciation applied to this asset. See Depreciation Methods

averagingMethod.description: The method of averaging applied to this asset. See Averaging Methods

effectiveLifeYears.description: Effective life of the asset in years (e.g. 5)

depreciableObjectId.description: Unique Xero identifier for the depreciable object

bookEffectiveDateOfChangeId.description: Unique Xero identifier for the effective date change

currentCapitalGain.description: When an asset is disposed, this will be the sell price minus the purchase price if a profit was made.

currentGainLoss.description: When an asset is disposed, this will be the lowest one of sell price or purchase price, minus the current book value.

costLimit.description: The value of the asset you want to depreciate, if this is less than the cost of the asset.

residualValue.description: The value of the asset remaining when you've fully depreciated it.

priorAccumDepreciationAmount.description: All depreciation prior to the current financial year.

currentAccumDepreciationAmount.description: All depreciation occurring in the current financial year.

canRollback.description: Boolean to indicate whether depreciation can be rolled back for this asset individually. This is true if it doesn't have 'legacy' journal entries and if there is no lock period that would prevent this asset from rolling back.

accountingBookValue.description: The accounting value of the asset

isDeleteEnabledForDate.description: Boolean to indicate whether delete is enabled

Idempotency-Key.description: This allows you to safely retry requests without the risk of duplicate processing. 128 character max.

assetTypeId.description: Xero generated unique identifier for asset types

assetTypeName.description: The name of the asset type

fixedAssetAccountId.description: The asset account for fixed assets of this type

depreciationExpenseAccountId.description: The expense account for the depreciation of fixed assets of this type

accumulatedDepreciationAccountId.description: The account for accumulated depreciation of fixed assets of this type

depreciationMethod.description: The method of depreciation applied to this asset. See Depreciation Methods

averagingMethod.description: The method of averaging applied to this asset. See Averaging Methods

effectiveLifeYears.description: Effective life of the asset in years (e.g. 5)

depreciableObjectId.description: Unique Xero identifier for the depreciable object

bookEffectiveDateOfChangeId.description: Unique Xero identifier for the effective date change

locks.description: All asset types that have accumulated depreciation for any assets that use them are deemed ‘locked’ and cannot be removed.

assetNumberPrefix.description: The prefix used for fixed asset numbers (“FA-” by default)

assetStartDate.description: The date depreciation calculations started on registered fixed assets in Xero

defaultGainOnDisposalAccountId.description: Default account that gains are posted to

defaultLossOnDisposalAccountId.description: Default account that losses are posted to

defaultCapitalGainOnDisposalAccountId.description: Default account that capital gains are posted to

references.queryDesc: Query parameters sent with the request
references.paramDesc: URL parameters sent with the request
references.headerDesc: HTTP headers sent when making the request
